name: Sweet Zingerita
preparation: In a shaker, combine the tequila, lime juice, and agave syrup with ice. Shake well. Strain into a chilled highball glass filled with ice. Top off with ginger beer and stir gently to integrate.
garnish: Lime wheel and a sprig of mint
backstory: The Sweet Zingerita merges the fiery zest of ginger beer with the classic, smooth undertones of tequila, brightened by a hint of lime. Designed for those who savor a sweet, fruity twist on a spirited evening.
